### Load the data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("titanic_project.csv", header=TRUE)
str(df)
```
### Divide into 80/20 train/test

```{r}
set.seed(1234)
i <- sample(1:nrow(df), 0.8*nrow(df), replace=FALSE)
train <- df[i,]
test <- df[-i,]
```

### Logistic Regression
```{r}
glm1 <- glm(survived~sex, data = train, family="binomial")
summary(glm1)
```
